pos review: Location very close to Brussels railway station Gare du MIDI and good breakfast.
Excellent location. Good staff and clean hotel.

neg review: Bathroom smelling like if someone had just smoke inside, they were doing Renovations to the hotel with drilling machine at 9am on the Sunday. Completely annoying.

pos review: The closeness to the railway station. The staff was friendly.
neg review: It was noisy and the room was not very clean, with deteriorated furniture.

pos review: Location was good. Clean enough. Staff was helpfull and  good humored.
Friendly, comfortable and convenient location, but..
neg review: The room faced over a busy, noisy road. Honking and sirens woke me up several times.
I did not feel save there.
